_sText:
This map is pretty large and some of the trikz are probably too hard for newer players.  There are ways to cheat a few of them, but I'll let you find them.  It's my second map, though the first I finished.  I'm far from a good mapper, but I think the style works and I fixed up most of the graphical kinks, though a few minor ones still remain.  

Testers: obnoxious/Jesus Christ, rad0n, Decoy

Thanks to:
GHS BoonDock for the disco/rave lighting prefab on FPSBanana (http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/1732)
`Asux^ for mapping advice

Inspiration from:
[X]trem [C]limbers Articole and Noobish (http://www.dailymotion.com/Articole)
Terracid and EXpMiNi for their mapping work (http://www.dailymotion.com/terracid) (http://forum.miniprod.fr/)
